rooms.description: Private master bedroom with an ensuite bathroom ensuring privacy and tranquility.

rooms.name: Bedroom 2

rooms.name: Bedroom 3
rooms.description: Third bedroom suitable for additional living space or a study area, compliant with Vastu guidelines for activity and creativity.

rooms.name: Library
rooms.description: Dedicated library area for reading and research, incorporating natural light and quiet surroundings.

rooms.name: Private Gym
rooms.description: Well-equipped private gym with essential fitness equipment; sound insulation and adequate ventilation provided.

rooms.name: Bathroom
rooms.description: Full bathroom adjoining the master bedroom ensuring convenience and privacy.

openings.description: Durable door with proper security features.
Windows designed for natural lighting and ventilation, following Vastu guidelines for auspicious placement.
Skylight to enhance natural illumination in common areas.

common_areas.name: Swimming Pool Area
